subject: Golf
Domestic Violence
Accidents and Safety
lead_paragraph: The ambulance crew that responded after Tiger Woods crashed his S.U.V. would not allow his wife to ride with him to the hospital because they thought it was a case of domestic violence.
snippet: The ambulance crew that responded after Tiger Woods crashed his S.U.V. would not allow his wife to ride with him to the hospital because they thought it was a case of domestic violence.
